players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."

Diana: "I am unsure of Alice's claim 
 I will investigate Bob tonight to gather more information."
You: "I will investigate Bob tonight as well. Let's gather more evidence before making any conclusions."
Bob: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Alice, your investigation is unnecessary as I can prove my innocence."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
